participant_1.background:

I love my family, but they can be very critical of me.
i listen to a lot of strange music.
while both my parents have thick european accents , i do not.

participant_2.background:
I keep fit by drinking a lot of tea and practicing my sport.
When it rains, I put on my headphones, grab a cup of coffee, and lose myself in my sketch book.
watching sports is fun.
My internal arguments are often more interesting than my conversations with others.
I'm a car enthusiast searching for a quiet, private home with plenty of space for my vintage cars.

content.text: It is going well, I am about to have a cup of tea and do some sketching.
Sounds relaxing. I am working part time in the campus library.
That sounds like a fun job, do you get to read a lot?
Yes, I do, and I also get to listen to music.
That sounds nice. I like to listen to music when I read, too.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I am particularly fond of classical music.
I like classical music too, but I also like listening to strange music.
Strange music? What do you mean?
Well, I like listening to music that is not very popular or well-known.
Oh, I see. I like to listen to music that I can dance to.
I do not dance, so I do not have much use for dance music.
That is okay, everyone has their own preferences
